title: Exam Purchasing System
purpose: Enable auditors to purchase exam invoices based on eligibility
business_value: Streamlines exam registration, enforces progression requirements, ensures payment compliance, and provides self-service capability
in_scope: Account page for exam invoice purchasing
Integration with good standing status verification
Re-sit designation, pricing, and attempt tracking
out_of_scope: Payment processing implementation (uses existing invoice system)
Good standing status determination (consumes existing data)

title: Credential Renewal Portal
purpose: Enable auditors to renew credentials, submit attestations, and pay renewal fees
business_value: Reduces manual renewal processing, improves compliance visibility, and gives auditors a self-service renewal experience

title: Continuing Education Tracking
purpose: Track continuing education credits and surface compliance gaps
business_value: Improves compliance reporting and reduces renewal delays due to missing CPE credits
